DOC.brief_summary: Investigators study 15 patient schedule pulmonary resection thoracotomy . Initial tidal volume ( VT ) 10ml kg-1 reduce 8ml kg-1 one lung ventilation ( OLV ) rate adjust maintain partial pressure arterial carbon dioxide ( PaCO2 ) 30-35 mm Hg . Data obtain : T1 , 15 min post establish OLV normocapnia , T2 , 15 min post establish OLV hypercapnia ( PaCO2 7.98kPa ( 60mmHg ) 9.31kPa ( 70mmHg ) pH > 7.1 ) , T3 , 15 min resume OLV normocapnia . One-way repeat measure analysis variance ( ANOVA ) , post hoc Dunnet´s test use analysis . A P value < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.brief_title: Permissive Hypercapnia During One Lung Ventilation : Impact Right Ventricular Systolic Diastolic Functions During Lung Resection
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators study 15 patient schedule elective pulmonary resection thoracotomy . Patients standardized management thoracotomy . Initial VT 10ml/ kg reduce 8ml/kg OLV rate adjust maintain PaCO2 30-35 mm Hg . Haemodynamic , respiratory variable echocardiographic data ( Tei index TAPSE ) obtain : T1 , 15 min post establish OLV normocapnia , T2 , 15 min post establish OLV hypercapnia ( PaCO2 7.98kPa ( 60mmHg ) 9.31kPa ( 70mmHg ) pH > 7.1 ) , T3 , 15 min resume OLV normocapnia . One-way repeat measure ANOVA , post hoc Dunnet´s test use analysis . A P value < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: adult > 18 yr elective pulmonary resection thoracotomy . Patients pulmonary hypertension ( systolic > 50mmHg ) , intracranial hypertension previous intracranial haemorrhage , preexist hypercapnia , coexist metabolic acidosis , ischaemic heart disease , predict postoperative FEV1 < 800 ml < 40 % expect pneumonectomy patient transesophageal echocardiography contraindicate necessary measurement difficult ass .
